title: Staff of flowing water
body: Why in item sets there is Staff of Flowing water from the Black Market Brawlers but no other item from there is this a new item coming onto the rift, it would be a nice touch to some champions that like roaming. If not is it a bug or you just forgot to take it off???

replies.body: Yeah I dunno what's up, it's been like that for a while. I made a [post](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy/BetRUEe9-new-ghost-item-staff-of-flowing-water-on-live-server) a few months ago with some more info on it if you're interested.
